name: anomalous3
text: Nerdspeak for "you mean the lady that I......BONED?"

name: cryptfiend85
text:
Two things that set Roast Beef on the warpath:
dissing his robot dog
computer lingo double entendres involving his mom

name: lacrimus
text: The two paths to Roast Beef Hog-Fluffery

name: diggidy
text:
I first read that as Hog-Floggery .
And it intrigued me.

name: jhunter
text:
i'd rather flog a hog than fluff one to be honest
hog fluffing is distinctly nastier tasting or so i imagine

name: ssddr
text: Why would Roast Beefs mom be calling? Isn't she at best absent and at worse abusive?

name: rotating-dog
text: Not yet, it's still early days. It all changes with Achewood 2.0

name: vic_tarasko
text: what is the start date for 2.0?

name: deancain29
text: thats a bit far, ray.

name: cousinted
text: A comment left by cousinted was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, NeoNaoNeo, Jesus, scraggg, windfish)

name: windfish
text: Perhaps I should refer to my girlfriend as a subroutine.  But then she would leave me.

name: korukyu
text: That's because we girls prefer to be referred to as "load balancers" as the alt text so graciously corrects.

name: donnatron
text: Agreed. Actually, we don't like being referred to as anything that uses the prefix "sub".

name: i_love_kate
text: GOD all of these generalisations are making me SO MAD. You can't speak for your entire gender! Stop pretending you can!

name: d-pad
text: I like to imagine that in Ray's book, "Windows again , huh?" is the default phrase for anything involving Windows.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Beef's face!

5'd

name: sdskyle
text: I think this is my favorite strip.

name: ryanfuss
text: i reckon Beef just sat still in silence for four seconds and then let out a flemmy sort of "Huc, what?"

name: mikeronomicon
text: I work with a ton of computer nerds, I'm gonna have to try that line.

name: mattylite
text:
Did you do it?
What did they say?

name: ham_shoes
text: Even though Beef's mom is a ruinous mess, that's still a little too forward, Ray

name: kalethan
text: oh, God, I can't believe how well he times the filler-hemming-and-hawing of the stuffed cats...

name: snachicat
text:
they are alive cats.

and yes.
